title: how to build libskiasharp.so for android
body:
### Description

I try to build SkiaSharp for android. I followed the Wiki here
https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/wiki/Building-on-Linux,skia version is 2.88.3,i use follow command to build:

sudo gn gen 'out/android/arm64' --args='is_component_build=true target_os="android" skia_enable_tools=false is_official_build=true skia_use_icu=false skia_use_piex=true
    skia_use_system_expat=false skia_use_system_freetype2=false skia_use_system_libjpeg_turbo=false skia_use_system_libpng=false skia_use_system_libwebp=false skia_use_system_zlib=false
    skia_enable_gpu=true ndk_api=21 ndk="/home/vinno/net8/android-ndk-r21/" target_cpu="arm64"'

`sudo ~/net8/depot_tools/depot_tools/ninja 'SkiaSharp' -C 'out/android/arm64'`

than error happens:
sudo ~/net8/depot_tools/depot_tools/ninja 'SkiaSharp' -C 'out/android/arm64'
ninja: Entering directory `out/android/arm64'
ninja: error: '../../../third_party/externals/zlib/adler32_simd.c', needed by 'obj/third_party/externals/zlib/zlib_adler32_simd.adler32_simd.o', missing and no known rule to make it

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/08c3406e-c45f-46dd-922f-dfadbbd60267)


### Code

`sudo gn gen 'out/android/arm64' --args='is_component_build=true target_os="android" skia_enable_tools=false is_official_build=true skia_use_icu=false skia_use_piex=true
    skia_use_system_expat=false skia_use_system_freetype2=false skia_use_system_libjpeg_turbo=false skia_use_system_libpng=false skia_use_system_libwebp=false skia_use_system_zlib=false
    skia_enable_gpu=true ndk_api=21 ndk="/home/vinno/net8/android-ndk-r21/" target_cpu="arm64"'`
